sys_script_include.description: A convenient way to access integer properties that is smart enough to discard values that would break assumptions we make elsewhere
sys_script_include.name: getPositiveIntegerProperty

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_51a8e5a01b2bb010749f0dc5604bcbd4
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_clgp_mail_to_acc.getPositiveIntegerProperty</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>A convenient way to access integer properties that is smart enough to discard values that would break assumptions we make elsewhere</description><name>getPositiveIntegerProperty</name><script><![CDATA[function getPositiveIntegerProperty(propertyName, defaultValue){
	if (!propertyName || !defaultValue || typeof defaultValue !== 'number')	throw new Error(
		'getPositiveIntegerProperty invoked with bad args: ' + JSON.stringify(arguments)
	);
	
	var rawProp = gs.getProperty(propertyName);
	// Parse property to a proper integer, may be NaN
	var parsedProp = parseInt(rawProp, 10);
	
	// If the value is positive, return it as-is (NaN fails this comparison)
	// Otherwise return the default value
	return parsedProp > 0
		? parsedProp
		: defaultValue;
}]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Chris.Crockett@CloudGoServices.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2021-10-28 20:17:23</sys_created_on><sys_id>51a8e5a01b2bb010749f0dc5604bcbd4</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>getPositiveIntegerProperty</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Email-based Account Assignment for CSM" source="x_clgp_mail_to_acc">136aa4d01bebb4101738a932604bcb5d</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Email-based Account Assignment for CSM">136aa4d01bebb4101738a932604bcb5d</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_51a8e5a01b2bb010749f0dc5604bcbd4</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Chris.Crockett@CloudGoServices.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2021-10-28 20:17:23</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
